translation.Name: Hawaii Note - Boat Captain
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: First Entry: There was a serious outbreak onboard this morning causing a few passengers to become
translation.insanely: aggresive. We've quarantined the infected and requested an emergency docking in Hawaii.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_4: Second Entry: The infection has spread through the lower floors of the ship and panic is taking hold of the passengers. We can see the shoreline now. Just a few more minutes...
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_6: Final Entry:  We're dead on the water. Almost everyone onboard is infected now. The final crew members are boarded up on the bridge. We're considering swimming for shore but we can see explosions in the distance. I pray whatever has plagued our vessel hasn't also hit the island...
